momo_description: Delicious Handmade dumplings served with homemade special mo:mo sauce. 6 pcs / 10 pcs
tandoori_description: All tandoori dishes served with basmati or brown rice or butter naan. Substitute to garlic or garlic cilantro add $1.75
biryani_description: Saffron flavored basmati rice stir fried with caramelized onion, roasted cashews, raisin and house blended spices. Served with side Raita
tikka_masala_description: Cooked in Special blend of spices, tomato, onion and creamy sauce we also can make it with Coconut cream, please let your server know
